values: 银行；堤岸；沙洲；浅滩；库；储备；排列；一系列；庄家；（飞机的）倾斜飞行；（道路或赛车跑道的）弯道倾斜处；（火的）燃料堆；（座位的）阶梯状排列；（云、雾等的）大片
存…入银行；积累（财富）；筑堤；倾侧；靠岸；使反弹；（在赌博中）担任庄家；（在比赛中）积分；（用煤等）封炉火；信赖（某人或某事）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 银行业；银行业务；银行家的职业；筑堤
把钱存入银行；做银行家；在…边筑堤（bank的现在分词）
银行家；银行业者；掘土工

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指紧靠大湖泊或海洋的陆地边缘或靠海的休养地。
多指有一定坡度的河岸、湖岸或堤岸。
尤指疗养地、游览地区的海边。
指倾斜度小，被海、湖或河水冲刷而有沙或卵石积存的地方。
地理学上的名词，专指被视为边界的沿海陆地的尽头。

word_group.brief_definition: 银行账户；银行往来账；银行存款
银行职员；银行办事员；银行的职员
花费不太大, 支付得起
地方储备银行；中央银行
地产储备；地产贷款银行

bilingual.source: The park is next to the bank.
You can put it in the bank.
The bank is next to the hospital.
The bank is next to the market.

bilingual.target: 奥利弗兑现了银行支票。

list.abstract: Bank（英 [bæŋk]，美 [bæŋk]），英语单词。作名词为堤岸；排组；银行等。作动词为倾侧；加马力；把…弄到靠岸等。例句：They saw the withdrawal of bank support.（他们看到了银行支持的撤销。） Bank的近义词shallow，ford，pile等。反义词的withdraw，mistrust。
Bank （内存库） 在内存行业里，Bank至少有三种意思；在SDRAM内存模组上，"bank 数"表示该内存的物理存储体的数量。Bank还表示一个SDRAM设备内部的逻辑存储库的数量。它还表示DIMM 或 SIMM连接插槽或插槽组，例如bank 1 或 bank A。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you seen our bank statement? Can this be right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有看过我们的银行对帐单了吗？ 没错吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Because the bank works. It's independent. It pays for itself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为这家银行的工作卓有成效，而且是独立运行，自负盈亏。

yingyinNormal.en: Aren't you the bank? I work for the bank. I don't think like a bank. Big bank, small bank, I like to make money. All right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不是银行的人吗？我在银行工作，但是我有不同的想法，不管大银行小银行，都是为了赚钱，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: But wait. You are the bank. You work for the bank. I bet your margins are pretty nice and fat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，你就是银行的，你为银行工作，你的提成应该很有油水吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my God, Max. My childhood bank. You had a childhood bank? I didn't even have a childhood.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，麦克斯，我童年的银行。你童年时期就有银行啦？我连童年都没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Like a bank, you know, except, it's better than a bank 'cause banks always get knocked off. No one knocks off old Tony.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你懂的，就像银行一样，只不过我这儿比银行更保险，因为银行总会破产，而老托尼始终屹立不倒。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, no. No. The bank owns our hedge fund, but we're not really part of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是的，对冲基金的所有权属于银行，但是我们并不是银行的一部分。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't say that. It's in a bank guarded by robots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没有那样说，是放在银行由机器人看守着。

yingyinNormal.en: You okay, Phoebe? Yeah, no. It's not worth. It's my bank.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比，你没事吧？我还好，是我的银行。

yingyinNormal.en: That missing plane was carrying the Secretary of the World Bank.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那架失踪客机搭载着世界银行的总裁。

yingyinNormal.en: Only that, in the entire history of Wall Street, no investment bank has ever failed unless caught in criminal activities.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只能说，华尔街的历史上从未有投资银行倒下，除非那个银行犯了罪。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't have it? And yet you have the audacity to ask the bank for money?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么说还没到手？那你还有脸来银行借钱？

yingyinNormal.en: Do you have any idea of the capital that this bank has invested in you, Gru?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道银行在你身上花多少钱了吗 格鲁？

yingyinNormal.en: There must be thousands of dollars here. Why don't you put it in the bank?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这儿得有好几千块了吧？你干嘛不存银行里？

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, I'll telephone the bank in the morning and return your thousand pounds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总之，我早上会打电话给银行还您的一千镑。

yingyinNormal.en: So don't do it. How can I not do it? I have $127 in the bank.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就别做啊。我怎么能不做呢？我银行里面只剩下127块了。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I know there have been some rumors going around that the bank is no longer funding us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道现在有些谣言说银行已经撤资了

yingyinNormal.en: I'm thinking. Okay. I'll call Deutsche Bank. Thank you, Ben. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在考虑，好吧，我会给德意志银行打个电话。谢谢你，本，谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: One place to start is by supporting something called the U.S. Export-Import Bank. Its sole mission is to create American jobs. That's it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中有一件事情就是支持美国进出口银行。该银行唯一的任务就是为美国创造就业岗位。事实也是如此。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you believe this? Now I have $1000 and a football phone. What bank is this?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们相信吗？现在我多了一千元和一个足球电话。这是哪家银行？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 堆积; 围; 封(炉火)

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 银行账户；银行往来账；银行存款

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 银行家；稳赢的赌注；捕鳕渔船；满汇流；水涨齐岸的河流；辅动机车；庄家；与实战结果相符的预测；纽芬兰渔民

word_family.mean: n. 堤岸；高坡；大块；丘墩；排组；台球桌橡皮内边；银行；容器；沙洲；庄家

sense_info_list.en: a business where people deposit and withdraw their money and borrow money

examination_example.sentence: Any guaranteed bonus of top executives could be delayed 10 years if their <highlight>banks</highlight> are under investigation for wrongdoing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果高管所在的银行因不当行为接受调查，那么他们的任何保证奖金都可能被推迟10年。

examination_example.sentence: Financial regulators in Britain have imposed a rather unusual rule on the bosses of big <highlight>banks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国金融监管机构对大银行的老板们实施了一项相当不寻常的规定。

examination_example.sentence: Many, like the Fundamental Physics Prize, are funded from the telephone-number-sized <highlight>bank</highlight> accounts of Internet entrepreneurs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多项目，比如基础物理奖，都是由互联网企业家的电话号码大小的银行账户资助的。

sense_info_list.en: Nor does it reveal how much companies are banking on the halo effect, rather than the other possible benefits, when they decide their do-gooding policies.

examination_example.sentence: Nor does it reveal how much companies are <highlight>banking</highlight> on the halo effect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它也没有揭示有多少公司寄希望于光环效应。

sense_info_list.en: the higher ground at the edge of a river, lake, or sea
raise a pile or mound around
sense_info_list.zh: 堆积; 围; 封(炉火)

sense_info_list.en: a storage place for a reserve supply
a group or series of objects arranged together in a row
the funds held by a gambling house or the dealer in some gambling games

word_usage.usage: “寄希望于某人或某事”可以说bank on sb./sth./doing sth.

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a business where people deposit and withdraw their money and borrow money

examination_example.sentence: We get connected with each other via Internet, shop online with mobile phones, and enjoy self-service on machines in <highlight>banks</highlight> and restaurants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们通过互联网相互联系，用手机在线购物，在银行和餐馆的机器上享受自助服务。

examination_example.sentence: The waiter found a <highlight>bank</highlight> envelope while cleaning off a table last Saturday at a restaurant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周六，服务员在一家餐馆清理桌子时发现了一个银行信封。

examination_example.sentence: For a long time after this renovation project, it was the tallest building in the United Kingdom, but it was eventually overtaken by the Mill <highlight>bank</highlight> Tower.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个改造项目之后的很长一段时间里，它是英国最高的建筑，但最终被米尔银行大厦(Mill bank Tower)超越。

sense_info_list.en: a storage place for a reserve supply
the higher ground at the edge of a river; lake; or sea

examination_example.sentence: As a child, I spent some time living with anumeric people, the Pirahã who live along the <highlight>banks</highlight> of the black Maici River.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩提时，我和(文化中)没有数字的人——皮拉哈人生活过一段时间，他们居住在黑色的迈西河。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指有一定坡度的河岸、湖岸或堤岸。
指倾斜度小，被海、湖或河水冲刷而有沙或卵石积存的地方。
地理学上的名词，专指被视为边界的沿海陆地的尽头。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 银行家；稳赢的赌注；捕鳕渔船；满汇流；水涨齐岸的河流；辅动机车；庄家；与实战结果相符的预测；纽芬兰渔民

word_family.mean: n. 堤岸；高坡；大块；丘墩；排组；台球桌橡皮内边；银行；容器；沙洲；庄家

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 银行职员；银行办事员；银行的职员

examination_example.sentence: We've all been there: in a lift, in line at the <highlight>bank</highlight> or on airplane, surrounded by people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都有过这样的经历：在电梯里、在银行排队或在飞机上，周围都是人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Banks</highlight>, companies, and government agencies use secret codes in doing business, especially when information is sent by computer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 银行、公司和政府机构在做生意时会加密，特别是当信息是通过计算机传送时。

examination_example.sentence: As you can see, it is on the North <highlight>Bank</highlight> of the River Thames.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如你所见，它位于泰晤士河北岸。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 银行家；稳赢的赌注；捕鳕渔船；满汇流；水涨齐岸的河流；辅动机车；庄家；与实战结果相符的预测；纽芬兰渔民

word_family.mean: n. 堤岸；高坡；大块；丘墩；排组；台球桌橡皮内边；银行；容器；沙洲；庄家

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 银行账户；银行往来账；银行存款

sense_info_list.en: a business where people deposit and withdraw their money and borrow money

examination_example.sentence: Most banks have a prepaid <highlight>bank</highlight> card designed for young people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数银行都有专为年轻人设计的预付银行卡。

examination_example.sentence: How to deal with <highlight>bank</highlight> accounts and mobile apps.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如何处理银行账户和手机应用。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>bank</highlight> is on the left of the supermarket.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 银行在超市左边。

sense_info_list.en: the higher ground at the edge of a river, lake, or sea

examination_example.sentence: She jumped into the sea without any hesitation (犹豫) and swam towards the opposite <highlight>bank</highlight> without any  protection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她毫不犹豫地跳入海中，在没有任何保护的情况下游向对岸。

examination_example.sentence: And she didn't know that the opposite <highlight>bank</highlight> was only one mile away when she gave up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而她放弃的时候，并不知道对岸只有一里之遥。

examination_example.sentence: A man was fishing on the <highlight>bank</highlight> of a river.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有个人在河边钓鱼。

sense_info_list.en: a storage place for a reserve supply

examination_example.sentence: Blood donors are those giving blood to blood <highlight>banks</highlight> or blood donation (捐赠) centers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 献血者是指捐献血给血库或捐血中心的人。

examination_example.sentence: Hospitals and blood <highlight>banks</highlight> store the blood and try to keep enough on hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医院和血库储存血液，并尽量保持足够的库存。

examination_example.sentence: Encourage your favorite restaurants to give unsold food to food <highlight>banks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鼓励你最喜欢的餐厅将未售出的食物提供给食物银行。
